Wrinkles...

Millions of women have them, hate them, and want to get rid of them.

Wrinkles appear when skin loses elasticity. To get rid of them, it’s necessary to increase collagen production.

Skin care products can’t independently influence collagen levels. They don’t penetrate deep layers of skin - they only moisturise from outside.

Mezoroller makes cosmetics 40 times more effective by allowing them to penetrate deeper and work from the inside.

Stimulate

Mezoluxe works towards results instead of making empty promises

Penetrates

540 titanium 0.05 mm microneedles long - as thick as a human hair - pierce the outer layer of skin (epidermis), the traumatic impact is mimimised..

Nourishes

540 titanium 0.05 mm microneedles long - as thick as a human hair - pierce the outer layer of skin (epidermis), the traumatic impact is mimimised..

Renews

Cells start to produce 200% more collagen after just first use. In a week, wrinkles flatten, pigmentation spots lighten..

Nourishes

ANTIAGE serum immediately gets into deep layers of the skin through holes made by a mezoroller. It acts directly in cells, stimulating collagen synthesis and smoothing wrinkles from inside.

Go Ahead!

60 seconds 3 times a week

step
1

Cleanse skin with your normal facial cleanser

step
2

Using mild pressure, gently roll back and forth at the same intensity on the treatment area 5-10 times in each of the four directions – horizontally, vertically and diagonally. Roll over each side of face, chin, lips, forehead and neck. Do not force the roller into your skin

step
3

Following treatment, apply ANTIAGE serum

get
The Result

Effect after first use

Pigmentation

Complexion evens out, skin becomes radiant, pigmentation spots gradually fade.

Wrinkles

Mezoluxe affects all face wrinkles, smoothes forehead wrinkles, nasolabial folds, and crow’s feet.

Enlarged pores

With regular use, Mezoluxe helps shrink pores and make skin smoother and more resilient.

Acne Scars

Red marks and pimple scars fade after the third use.
